data.title: Roundtable Recap: July 20 – Startup Ecosystem Development Strategy for Underdeveloped India

data.text:
Posted on Friday, Jul 21st 2023

During this week’s roundtable, we did a strategy session on how to develop startup ecosystems and pipelines of entrepreneurs outside of the six major metros based on my blog series, Startup Ecosystem in Kolkata: A Strategy Discussion. Very interesting discussion.

BRIKS Technology

For our entrepreneur pitch, we had Kiran Das from Cochin, India, pitch BRIKS Technology, a Generative AI startup focused on e-commerce sales enablement through virtual assistants and chatbots.

You can listen to the recording of this roundtable here:

If you haven’t already, please study our Udemy courses, free Bootstrapping course and the Investor Introductions page.

As always, I would very much like to hear about your business, so let me invite you to come and pitch at one of our free 1Mby1M public roundtables. We will be holding future roundtables on:

July 27 – July Spotlight on Women Entrepreneurs, Register Here.

August 3 – August Spotlight on Odisha Startups, Register Here.

August 10 – August Spotlight on Bihar Startups, Register Here.

August 24 – August Spotlight on Assam Startups, Register Here.

August 31 – August Spotlight on Central India Startups, Register Here.

If you want a deeper relationship with me, you are very welcome to join the 1Mby1M premium program. If you have any questions about the program, please, first study the website, especially What to expect from the 1Mby1M premium program and the FAQs. If you have additional questions, please email me, and I would be very happy to respond. Please note that I work exclusively with 1Mby1M entrepreneurs.
